versions.title: Contact page launch
versions.overview: Launching Contact Page to enable users to provide useful feedback.

changes.text: Modified the Contact page component to fully support Contact page interactions and template-driven feedback.
Fixed an issue where a Side Menu button remained focused and did not collapse after click.
Added a full About Me page with profile section and personal introduction.

Added Coming Soon pages for About Me, Settings, Updates, and Contact.

versions.title: Removed negative subtraction results

changes.text: Subtraction now clamps to non-negative results.
